CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 3, 1945, pg. 5, reads: "Thirtieth Anniversary - Mr. and Mrs. Charles Harper Sr. of 713 Clarissa Street, celebrated their 30th Anniversary recently, at the home of their daughter, Mrs. Wilda Bryant. The occasion marked the first family reunion for the family in six years. The Harpers, seated, left to right, are: Alice, Mrs. Harper, Billy Bryant, Mr. Harper, Doris, and Walt, the popular band leader. Standing are Mr. and Mrs. Charles Harper Jr., Mrs. Wilda Bryant and Ernie. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Harper family with Frank Bryant seated in center, Nate Harper, Alice Harper, Lucinda Harper, Charles Harper Sr., Doris Harper, and Walt Harper seated on sofa, and Addie Harper, Charles Harper Jr., Wilda Harper Bryant, and Ernie Harper standing in rear
